Definition of The Day Buying Power Sector Watch One support alert was hit Thursday Play of the Day FOE MARKET WRAP DDDDDDDDDDD Chip Fest Intel NASDAQINTC gave its firstever midquarter update just after the bell reaffirming second quarter guidance and suggesting stronger earnings in the second half The company said that second quarter sales would be at the lower end of the expectations but within expectations at least as the worlds largest semiconductor maker struggles with a slowdown in PC sales Shares of semis were moving up in response during afterhours trading The company has been pummeled by weak demand for microprocessors in the current economic downturn When it reported firstquarter earnings however Intel had said it saw encouraging signs for a stronger second half This was despite firstquarter net income plunging percent on a percent decline in sales Shares of Intel have fallen percent since its record high of in August compared to the Nasdaq Composite index COMPX fall of percent during that time period Intel gained percent to today during regular trading During the day positive expectations about the Intel report helped spark a rush to buy semiconductor shares In addition despite a weak earnings forecast from National Semiconductor NYSENSM for the next quarter the company commented in its conference call that the improvement in the quarter has come from quickturnover orders from cell phone companies As a result the rally spread to stocks such as Qualcomm NASDAQQCOM Nokia NYSENOK and Motorola NYSEMOT Applied Micro NASDAQAMCC led the communication IC stocks higher CE Unterberg Towbin analysts left a meeting with the company with the notion that nearterm order cancellations push outs and debookings had nearly evaporated That news also lit a fire under PMC Sierra NASDAQPMCS Also last night the Semiconductor Industry Association projected percent growth in which was revised upward from percent and percent for The revision may indicate that a bottom is near in the sector Corroborating that view was Banc of America Securities which said that motherboard checks sounds like fun at Computex in Taiwan showed positive indications for the third quarter They also noted that conversations with four large Taiwanese manufacturers showed an increase in OEM activity The Semiconductor Index SOXX has jumped percent since last Wednesdays low of Its now at a percent gain today just beyond its pivotal day moving average which last month acted as strong resistance that turned back the index nearly percent Can it move through it this time All of the action today was on moderate volume which showed some caution ahead of the Intel comments But when the dust settled the techbound Nasdaq Composite index COMPX picked up points or percent to reach The SP SPX bigcaps were up or percent to And the Dow Jones Industrials DJI after being underwater this morning closed up points or percent to In other tech news chipmaker Broadcom NASDAQBRCM warned of a steeperthanexpected sales decrease in its second quarter and announced cost cutting plans The company slashed second quarter revenue expectations late yesterday citing continued weakness in the technology sector Nonetheless Broadcom said in its conference call that it saw signs of increasing new orders that may well lead to renewed growth by years end Discouraging news from the retail sector came in today Unseasonable weather in the Midwest and Northeast lowered clothing purchases in May and high fuel prices and consumer concerns about the economy reduced mall traffic resulting in slow monthly retail sales Large retailers including Gap NYSEGPS and Federated Department Stores NYSEFD warned of additional weakness in sales andor earnings Also Pacific Sunwear NASDAQPSUN was downgraded All in all it seems the overall samestore retail sales pickup in April may not have been the precursor to recovery that was thought Nonetheless electronic retailers were up today partially due to good news out of Best Buy NYSEBBY which posted a percent increase in Q sales and said that quarterly earnings would be in line with estimates This news also sparked Circuit City NYSECC up percent and Radio Shack NYSERSH up percent Shares of Philip Morris NYSEMO and other tobacco stocks started to plunge in after hours trading yesterday after an LA jury ordered a record billion payout to a smoker with incurable lung and brain cancer Nonetheless analysts and even antismoking activists said the verdict likely would be reduced by the judge or overturned on appeal Philip Morris closed off its lows for the day to lose percent at RJ Reynolds NYSERJR was down further though at percent to In other news banking regulators said US commercial banks earned a record billion during the first quarter This number was padded by billion worth of securities sales however which masked more fundamental concerns about the sector The Federal Deposit Insurance Corp added that troubled commercial and industrial loans continued to increase especially at larger banks and interest rate margins continued to decline Banks charged off billion in bad loans in the first quarter a percent rise from the same period last year New state jobless claims rose to the highest level since November last week revealing a still weakening job market which may not have bottomed yet New claims soared above the key level for the third straight week the longest string since September of Economists had expected a modest drop in claims from the prior week Here comes the Fed Treasury prices gained early as a result of the aforementioned jobless claims report that raised expectations of further interest rate cuts by the Federal Reserve Then they weakened as the year bond the most vulnerable to a potential inflationigniting recovery shed at with a yield of percent for a gain of basis points The year Treasury lost at to yield percent a pickup of basis points The year note dropped at to yield percent for a gain of basis points Finally the Fedsensitive year note was flat at for a yield of percent For Tomorrow There is a gap between what Intel is saying about the future and what its boxmaker customers are saying Whos right Well be watching to see how this plays out tomorrow See Intel run See the market react Bruce Feldman Staff Analyst wwwstockbottomcom Advertisement Tired of waiting on trades to execute Does your broker offer Stop Losses on Options Trade instantly with Stop Losses at PreferredTrade Inc Stop Losses based on the option price or the stock price Move your trading into the next most basic definition refers to institutional sized accumulation or distribution over a long period BOP tells you whether the underlying activity in a stock is characterized by systematic buying or selling Go to glossaryviewglossaryaspglossaryidD for complete definition Sector Watch DDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDD DDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDD DDDDDDDDDDDDDDD As of Market Close Thursday One support alert was hit Thursday The Airline Index XAL was unable to pull out of its nose dive in time to prevent a support alert from being hit I doubt well see any support alerts being hit in technology sectors in the near future after Intels postive guidance Lowering support XAL Key Benchmarks Broad Market Last SupportResistance Alert DOW Industrials SPX SP COMPX NASD Composite OEX SP RUT Russell NDX NASD MSH High Tech BTK Biotech XCI Hardware GSOX Software SOX Semiconductor NWX Networking INX Internet BIX Banking XBD Brokerage IUX Insurance RLX Retail DRG Drug HCX Healthcare XAL Airline OIX Oil Gas For a education and daily commentary trackingaspcampaignidD DDDDDDDDDDDDDDD Play of The Day Long DDDDDDDDDDDDDDD FOE Ferro Corp sl Ferro Corporation is a worldwide producer of performance materials for manufacturers The Companys portfolio of products includes coatings for ceramics and metal electronic materials pigments fine chemicals and polymer additives specialty plastic compounds and colors The Companys materials are used in a wide variety of markets These include building and renovation major appliances household furnishings transportation and industrial products Ferros products are sold principally in the United States and Europe however operations extend to the Latin America and Asia Pacific Tonight we add a small cap company in the chemical group to the play list as a long Since the beginning of the year the Russell index of small capitalization companies has turned in a positive return while the Nasdaq Composite is sitting with a loss Looking at the SP Chemical Index CEXX buyers have obviously been stepping up to the plate with the index tacking on an impressive gain since the beginning of Q alone What makes Ferro even more appealing is the fact that the group has pulled back from gains of retracing all the way back to the dma but bounced firmly off this support point last Friday and advancing points or today Fundamentally speaking Ferro is experiencing weaker profits like the rest of the world but did manage to grow revenues sequentially as reported in its last earnings report on The company posted revenue of million and net income of million or cents per share as compared with in the first quarter of In a press release the firms CEO Hector R Ortino discussed several cost cutting measures to assist in the earnings battle including a program to reduce employment costs on a worldwide basis by more than million annually When the markets are to fully recover deep cyclicals like FOE as well as others in the group will need to lead the way While the stock was recently downgraded by McDonald Key Corp we like what we see on the chart Shares have broken out of a trading range between and and have done so on volume numbers that are far above average With the exception of some small speed bumps in the road there really is very little to stop FOE from making an attempt at a new week high Participation was a bit light today however MACD sits firmly above the trigger line as well as in positive territory As for an entry point with being a nice gain from here we see no reason not to get on board now The more conservative really an oxymoron when talking about a chemical stock may want to wait for a pullback and bounce off of the to level if it happens Average Daily Volume D K week High D Low D Next Earnings est D NA versus D NA ChartD
